docBody.head: Branch 5 Women to Organize.
docBody.p: There will be a meeting to-night of the women of Branch 5, held under the auspices of the Women's Committee on Socialist and Suffrage Propaganda among women for the purpose of organizing the women of Branch 5 into active service. The meeting will be held at the Harlem Forum, 360 West 125th Street (Pinken Building) at 8:15 p.m. sharp.
All Comrades who have sisters or wives and mothers, urge them to attend this meeting and become interested in this work, which the Women's Committee is carrying on among the women of New York City.
